content:
Hi! I'm Richard Zandi, new to Lean/Mathlib. I'd like to submit a PR adding the theorem squarefree_not_isSquare to Data.Nat.Squarefree based on discussion in #Is there code for X?.

My GitHub username is: RichardZandi.

Could I get write access to create a branch? Thanks!
Please add your github username to your Zulip profile first!
